mapper.update:
UPDATE RD_WEEK_INFO a, ( SELECT wi.WEEK_ID, SUM(if(wr.FIX_DAY IS NULL , 1, 0)) AS NOT_CNT FROM RD_WEEK_INFO wi LEFT JOIN RD_WEEK_RIDER_INFO wr ON wi.WEEK_ID = wr.week_id JOIN COMTNFILE a ON wi.ATCH_FILE_ID = a.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND wi.FIX_DAY is NULL AND a.USE_AT ='Y' AND wi.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId}
GROUP BY wi.WEEK_ID )b SET a.FIX_DAY = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') WHERE a.WEEK_ID = b.WEEK_ID AND b.NOT_CNT = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RD_DELIVERY_ERROR (LONGTXT, ATCH_FILE_ID, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID, USE_AT) VALUES (#{longtxt},#{atchFileId},SYSDATE(),#{creatId}, #{useAt})
mapper.select: SELECT LONGTXT, ATCH_FILE_ID, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID, USE_AT FROM RD_DELIVERY_ERROR WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchId} AND USE_AT = 'Y'

SELECT WEEK_ID,COOPERATOR_ID,ACCOUNTS_ST_DT,ACCOUNTS_ED_DT ,DELIVERY_COST ,ADD_ACCOUNTS ,OPERATING_COST,MANAGEMENT_COST ,OPERATING_FEE,ETC_COST,TIME_INSURANCE,OWNER_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE,RIDER_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE,OWNER_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE ,RIDER_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE,WITHHOLDING_TAX_INSURANCE_SUM,EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE_ACCOUNTS,INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE_ACCOUNTS ,G,ACCOUNTS_SCHEDULE_COST,TAX_BILL_SUPPLY,TAX_BILL_ADD ,TAX_BILL_SUM ,NOTE,ATCH_FILE_ID,CREAT_DT,CREAT_ID FROM RD_WEEK_INFO WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId}
/* 협력사 조건 *//* COOPERATOR_ID로 조건을 만든건 ★정산 파일을 올릴때 권한이 있는 협력사ID 데이터만 올릴수 있음!!★ - 나머지는 오류 처리할꺼임 */ AND COOPERATOR_ID IN ( SELECT COOPERATOR_ID FROM RD_COOPERATOR a WHERE a.REGISTRATION_SN = #{schIhidNum} AND use_at ='Y' )

SELECT a.WEEK_ID, a.COOPERATOR_ID, b.MBER_ID, 'WEK' AS DW_GUBUN, '1' AS IO_GUBUN, b.GIVE_PAY ,b.GIVE_PAY - c.CALL_FEE_COST AS ABLE_PRICE, c.CALL_FEE_COST , 0 AS FEE, #{accountsStDt} AS ACCOUNTS_ST_DT, #{accountsEdDt} AS ACCOUNTS_ED_DT, #{atchFileId} AS ATCH_FILE_ID, 'Y' AS USE_AT FROM RD_WEEK_INFO a LEFT JOIN RD_WEEK_RIDER_INFO b on a.WEEK_ID = b.week_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.COOPERATOR_ID, a.mber_id, SUM(nvl(b.COST, 0)+ nvl(c.COST, 0)) AS CALL_FEE_COST FROM RD_DAY_PAY a LEFT JOIN RD_PROFIT b ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = b.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.mber_id = b.MBER_ID AND b.gubun ='C' AND a.DYP_ID = b.DYP_ID AND b.use_at ='Y' LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_PROFIT c ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = c.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.mber_id = c.MBER_ID AND c.gubun ='C' AND a.DYP_ID = c.DYP_ID AND c.use_at ='Y'
WHERE 1=1 AND a.WEEK_YN = 'N' AND a.USE_AT ='Y' AND a.IO_GUBUN = '1' AND a.COOPERATOR_ID = #{cooperatorId} AND a.DAY BETWEEN #{accountsStDt} AND #{accountsEdDt} GROUP BY a.COOPERATOR_ID, a.mber_id ) c ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = c.COOPERATOR_ID AND b.MBER_ID = c.MBER_ID WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId}

SELECT tab.WEEK_ID, tab.COOPERATOR_ID, tab.MBER_ID, tab.cnt, tab.delivery_cnt , tab.fee_id, tab.RIDER_FEE_ID, tab.fee_program, tab.fee_program_salesman , tab.fee_call , tab.fee_cooperator_call , tab.DW_GUBUN, tab.IO_GUBUN, tab.GIVE_PAY , tab.ABLE_PRICE - (cnt -delivery_cnt) *FEE_CALL - (cnt -delivery_cnt)*FEE_PROGRAM AS ABLE_PRICE, tab.CALL_FEE_COST, tab.PROGRAM_FEE_COST , tab.FEE, tab.ACCOUNTS_ST_DT, tab.ACCOUNTS_ED_DT, tab.ATCH_FILE_ID, tab.USE_AT, tab.ESNTL_ID, tab.EMPLYR_ID, tab.SALES_ESNTL_ID , (cnt -delivery_cnt) *FEE_CALL AS FEE_CALL_COST /* 전체 콜수수료 */ , FLOOR(((cnt -delivery_cnt) *FEE_CALL)*FEE_COOPERATOR_CALL*0.01) AS FEE_COOPERATOR_CALL_COST /*협력사 콜수수료*/ , (cnt -delivery_cnt)*FEE_PROGRAM AS FEE_PROGRAM_COST /* 전체 프로그램료 */ , (cnt -delivery_cnt)*FEE_PROGRAM_SALESMAN AS FEE_PROGRAM_SALESMAN_COST /* 영업사원 프로그램료 */ FROM ( SELECT a.WEEK_ID, a.COOPERATOR_ID, b.MBER_ID, b.cnt, d.delivery_cnt , nvl(d.fee_id, g.fee_id) AS fee_id, nvl(d.RIDER_FEE_ID, h.RIDER_FEE_ID) AS RIDER_FEE_ID , nvl(e.fee_program, g.fee_program) AS fee_program, nvl(e.fee_program_salesman, g.fee_program_salesman) AS fee_program_salesman , nvl(nvl(f.fee_call,e.fee_call), nvl(h.fee_call, g.fee_call)) AS fee_call , nvl(e.fee_cooperator_call , g.fee_cooperator_call) AS fee_cooperator_call ,'WEK' AS DW_GUBUN, '1' AS IO_GUBUN, b.GIVE_PAY , b.GIVE_PAY - nvl(d.CALL_FEE_COST, 0) - nvl(d.PROGRAM_FEE_COST, 0) AS ABLE_PRICE, d.CALL_FEE_COST, d.PROGRAM_FEE_COST , 0 AS FEE, a.ACCOUNTS_ST_DT, a.ACCOUNTS_ED_DT, a.ATCH_FILE_ID, 'Y' AS USE_AT, d.ESNTL_ID, i.EMPLYR_ID, j.ESNTL_ID AS SALES_ESNTL_ID FROM RD_WEEK_INFO a LEFT JOIN RD_WEEK_RIDER_INFO b on a.WEEK_ID = b.week_id LEFT JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER c ON b.mber_id = c.mber_id JOIN COMTNFILE d ON a.ATCH_FILE_ID = d.ATCH_FILE_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT wi.COOPERATOR_ID, wr.mber_id, d.ESNTL_ID
, SUM(nvl(if(wi.accounts_st_dt <= a.DAY AND wi.accounts_ed_dt >= a.DAY, b.COST, 0), 0)) + SUM(nvl(if(wi.accounts_st_dt <= a.DAY AND wi.accounts_ed_dt >= a.DAY, c.COST, 0), 0)) CALL_FEE_COST , SUM(nvl(if(wi.accounts_st_dt <= a.DAY AND wi.accounts_ed_dt >= a.DAY, e.COST, 0), 0)) + SUM(nvl(if(wi.accounts_st_dt <= a.DAY AND wi.accounts_ed_dt >= a.DAY, g.COST, 0), 0))PROGRAM_FEE_COST , a.DAY, wi.accounts_st_dt, wi.accounts_ed_dt , SUM(nvl(if(wi.accounts_st_dt <= a.DAY AND wi.accounts_ed_dt >= a.DAY, a.delivery_cnt, 0), 0)) AS delivery_cnt , MAX(if(wi.accounts_st_dt <= a.DAY AND wi.accounts_ed_dt >= a.DAY, a.fee_id, null)) AS fee_id , MAX(if(wi.accounts_st_dt <= a.DAY AND wi.accounts_ed_dt >= a.DAY, a.RIDER_FEE_ID, null)) AS RIDER_FEE_ID
, d.MBER_NM FROM RD_WEEK_INFO wi LEFT JOIN RD_WEEK_RIDER_INFO wr ON wi.WEEK_ID = wr.week_id LEFT JOIN RD_DAY_PAY a ON wi.COOPERATOR_ID = a.COOPERATOR_ID AND wr.MBER_ID = a.mber_id AND a.use_at = 'Y' AND IO_GUBUN= '1' AND a.WEEK_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN RD_PROFIT b ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = b.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.mber_id = b.MBER_ID AND b.gubun ='C' AND a.DYP_ID = b.DYP_ID LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_PROFIT c ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = c.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.mber_id = c.MBER_ID AND c.gubun ='C' AND a.DYP_ID = c.DYP_ID LEFT JOIN RD_PROFIT e ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = e.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.mber_id = e.MBER_ID AND e.gubun ='P' AND a.DYP_ID = e.DYP_ID LEFT JOIN RD_SALES_PROFIT g ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = g.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.mber_id = g.MBER_ID AND g.gubun ='P' AND a.DYP_ID = g.DYP_ID LEFT JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER d ON wr.mber_id = d.mber_id JOIN COMTNFILE f ON wi.ATCH_FILE_ID = f.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND wr.FIX_DAY is null AND f.USE_AT ='Y' AND wi.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId} GROUP BY wi.COOPERATOR_ID, wr.mber_id ) d ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = d.COOPERATOR_ID AND b.MBER_ID = d.MBER_ID LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_FEE e ON d.fee_id = e.fee_id -- 일정산했던 수수료 기준으로 누락된 배달건수에 대한 콜,운영수수료를 책정한다 LEFT JOIN RD_RIDER_FEE f ON d.RIDER_FEE_ID = f.RIDER_FEE_ID LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_FEE g ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = g.COOPERATOR_ID AND g.use_at ='Y' -- 일정산 수수료 이력이 없을 시 최근 수수료 기준으로 책정 LEFT JOIN RD_RIDER_FEE h ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = h.COOPERATOR_ID AND b.MBER_ID = h.MBER_ID AND h.use_at ='Y' LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_SALES i ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = i.COOPERATOR_ID AND i.use_AT ='Y' LEFT JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO j ON i.EMPLYR_ID = j.EMPLYR_ID WHERE 1=1 AND b.FIX_DAY is null AND d.USE_AT ='Y' AND a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId} ) tab

SELECT wi.COOPERATOR_ID, sum(wr.cnt) AS DELIVERY_CNT, a.FEE_COOPERATOR_AT, a.FEE_PROGRAM, a.FEE_ID, wi.ACCOUNTS_ED_DT FROM RD_WEEK_INFO wi JOIN RD_WEEK_RIDER_INFO wr ON wi.WEEK_ID = wr.week_id JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_FEE a ON wi.COOPERATOR_ID = a.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.use_at ='Y' JOIN COMTNFILE f ON wi.ATCH_FILE_ID = f.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND wr.FIX_DAY is null AND f.USE_AT ='Y' AND wi.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId}

SELECT wi.COOPERATOR_ID, wr.MBER_ID, wr.CNT AS DELIVERY_CNT, a.FEE_COOPERATOR_AT, a.FEE_PROGRAM , nvl(b.FEE_ID,a.FEE_ID) AS FEE_ID, nvl(b.RIDER_FEE_ID,c.RIDER_FEE_ID) AS RIDER_FEE_ID, wi.ACCOUNTS_ST_DT, wi.ACCOUNTS_ED_DT, g.ESNTL_ID , nvl(e.FEE_CALL, d.FEE_CALL) AS FEE_CALL ,wr.WEEK_ID,wr.NO,wr.MBER_ID,wr.MBER_NM,wr.CNT,wr.DELIVERY_COST,wr.ADD_COST,wr.SUM_COST,wr.TIME_INSURANCE,wr.NECESSARY_EXPENSES,wr.PAY,wr.OWNER_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE ,wr.RIDER_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE,wr.OWNER_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE,wr.RIDER_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE,wr.WITHHOLDING_TAX_INSURANCE_SUM ,wr.OWNER_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE_ACCOUNTS,wr.RIDER_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE_ACCOUNTS,wr.SUM_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE_ACCOUNTS ,wr.OWNER_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE_ACCOUNTS,wr.RIDER_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE_ACCOUNTS,wr.SUM_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE_ACCOUNTS ,wr.OPERATING_COST,wr.ACCOUNTS_COST,wr.INCOME_TAX,wr.RESIDENCE_TAX,wr.WITHHOLDING_TAX,wr.GIVE_PAY,wr.CREAT_DT,wr.CREAT_ID FROM RD_WEEK_INFO wi JOIN RD_WEEK_RIDER_INFO wr ON wi.WEEK_ID = wr.WEEK_ID JOIN COMTNFILE f ON wi.ATCH_FILE_ID = f.ATCH_FILE_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.WEEK_ID, b.MBER_ID, MAX(c.FEE_ID) AS FEE_ID, MAX(c.RIDER_FEE_ID) AS RIDER_FEE_ID FROM RD_WEEK_INFO a JOIN RD_WEEK_RIDER_INFO b ON a.WEEK_ID = b.WEEK_ID LEFT JOIN RD_DAY_PAY c ON b.MBER_ID = c.MBER_ID and c.DAY BETWEEN a.ACCOUNTS_ST_DT AND a.ACCOUNTS_ED_DT AND c.IO_GUBUN = '1' AND c.USE_AT ='Y' WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId} GROUP BY b.WEEK_ID, b.mber_id ) b ON wr.WEEK_ID = b.WEEK_ID AND wr.MBER_ID = b.MBER_ID -- 일정산 기준 수수료을 1차로 가져옴 JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_FEE a ON wi.COOPERATOR_ID = a.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.use_at ='Y' -- 일정산 수수료 기준이 없을때 가져옴 LEFT JOIN RD_RIDER_FEE c ON wi.COOPERATOR_ID = c.COOPERATOR_ID AND b.MBER_ID = c.MBER_ID AND c.use_at ='Y'-- 일정산 수수료 기준이 없을때 가져옴 JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_FEE d ON nvl(b.FEE_ID,a.FEE_ID) = d.fee_id -- 기준이 된 최종 수수료 LEFT JOIN RD_RIDER_FEE e ON nvl(b.RIDER_FEE_ID,c.RIDER_FEE_ID) = e.RIDER_FEE_ID -- 기준이 된 최종 수수료 JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER g ON wr.MBER_ID = g.MBER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND f.USE_AT ='Y' AND wi.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId}

SELECT * FROM RD_BALANCE WHERE (COOPERATOR_ID, ESNTL_ID) IN ( SELECT a.COOPERATOR_ID, c.ESNTL_ID
FROM RD_WEEK_INFO a LEFT JOIN RD_WEEK_RIDER_INFO b on a.WEEK_ID = b.week_id LEFT JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER c ON b.mber_id = c.mber_id JOIN COMTNFILE d ON a.ATCH_FILE_ID = d.ATCH_FILE_ID
WHERE 1=1 AND b.FIX_DAY is null AND d.USE_AT ='Y' AND d.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId}
GROUP BY a.COOPERATOR_ID, c.ESNTL_ID ) FOR UPDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RD_WEEK_PAY (WKP_ID, COOPERATOR_ID, MBER_ID, DW_GUBUN, IO_GUBUN, ABLE_PRICE, FEE, SEND_PRICE, ACCOUNTS_ST_DT , ACCOUNTS_ED_DT, DYP_ID, ATCH_FILE_ID, WEEK_ID, TRAN_DAY, TELEGRAM_NO, ETC_ID, USE_AT, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID) VALUE(#{wkpId}, #{cooperatorId}, #{mberId}, #{dwGubun}, #{ioGubun}, #{ablePrice}, #{fee}, #{sendPrice} , #{accountsStDt}, #{accountsEdDt}, #{dypId}, #{atchFileId}, #{weekId}, #{tranDay}, #{telegramNo}, #{etcId},#{useAt}, SYSDATE(), #{creatId})

INSERT RD_ETC_NOT (ETC_NOT_ID, ETC_ID, COOPERATOR_ID, MBER_ID, DAY, BALANCE0, BALANCE1, MSG, CREAT_ID, CREAT_DT) VALUES (#{etcNotId}, #{etcId}, #{cooperatorId}, #{mberId}, #{day}, #{balance0}, #{balance1}, #{msg}, #{creatId}, SYSDATE())

INSERT INTO RD_DAY_PAY (DYP_ID, COOPERATOR_ID,MBER_ID, DAY, IO_GUBUN, DELIVERY_PRICE, DELIVERY_CNT, DAY_FEE, INSURANCE, SEND_FEE, ABLE_PRICE, SEND_PRICE, WEEK_YN , DAY_ATCH_FILE_ID, WEK_ATCH_FILE_ID, WEEK_ID, FEE_ID, RIDER_FEE_ID, TRAN_DAY, TELEGRAM_NO, USE_AT, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID, ETC_ID) VALUES(#{dypId}, #{cooperatorId}, #{mberId}, #{day}, #{ioGubun}, #{deliveryPrice}, #{deliveryCnt}, #{dayFee}, #{insurance}, #{sendFee}, #{ablePrice}, #{sendPrice}, #{weekYn} , #{dayAtchFileId}, #{wekAtchFileId}, #{weekId}, #{feeId}, #{riderFeeId}, #{tranDay}, #{telegramNo}, #{useAt}, SYSDATE(), #{creatId}, #{etcId})
mapper.select: SELECT if(COUNT(week_id)>=1, false, true) able FROM RD_WEEK_INFO a JOIN COMTNFILE b ON a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE cooperator_id = #{cooperatorId} AND b.use_at ='Y' AND (#{accountsStDt} between ACCOUNTS_ST_DT AND ACCOUNTS_ED_DT OR #{accountsEdDt} between ACCOUNTS_ST_DT AND ACCOUNTS_ED_DT)
mapper.update:
UPDATE RD_BALANCE a, ( SELECT a.COOPERATOR_ID, d.ESNTL_ID, SUM(able_price) AS able_price FROM RD_WEEK_INFO wi LEFT JOIN RD_WEEK_RIDER_INFO wr ON wi.WEEK_ID = wr.week_id LEFT JOIN RD_DAY_PAY a ON wi.COOPERATOR_ID = a.COOPERATOR_ID AND wr.MBER_ID = a.mber_id AND a.use_at = 'Y' AND IO_GUBUN= '1' LEFT JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER d ON wr.mber_id = d.mber_id JOIN COMTNFILE b ON wi.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND wr.FIX_DAY is NULL AND b.USE_AT ='Y' AND a.WEEK_YN = 'N' AND wi.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId}
AND if(wi.accounts_st_dt <= a.DAY AND wi.accounts_ed_dt >= a.DAY, 1, 0) =1 AND a.WEEK_YN ='N' AND a.USE_AT ='Y' AND a.IO_GUBUN = '1' GROUP BY a.COOPERATOR_ID, d.ESNTL_ID )b SET a.BALANCE0 = a.BALANCE0 - b.able_price , a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE() , a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE a.COOPERATOR_ID = b.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.ESNTL_ID = b.ESNTL_ID

UPDATE RD_DAY_PAY a, ( SELECT a.COOPERATOR_ID, a.mber_id, wi.ATCH_FILE_ID, wi.WEEK_ID FROM RD_WEEK_INFO wi LEFT JOIN RD_WEEK_RIDER_INFO wr ON wi.WEEK_ID = wr.week_id JOIN RD_DAY_PAY a ON wi.COOPERATOR_ID = a.COOPERATOR_ID AND wr.MBER_ID = a.mber_id AND a.use_at = 'Y' AND IO_GUBUN= '2' LEFT JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER d ON wr.mber_id = d.mber_id JOIN COMTNFILE b ON wi.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND wr.FIX_DAY is NULL AND b.USE_AT = 'Y' AND wi.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId}
) b SET a.WEEK_YN ='Y' , a.WEK_ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID , a.WEEK_ID = b.WEEK_ID , a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE() , a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE a.WEEK_YN ='N' AND a.USE_AT ='Y' AND a.IO_GUBUN = '2' AND a.COOPERATOR_ID = b.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.mber_id = b.mber_id

update RD_COOPERATOR_PAY a, ( SELECT wi.* FROM RD_WEEK_INFO wi JOIN COMTNFILE b ON wi.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND wi.FIX_DAY is NULL AND b.USE_AT ='Y' AND wi.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId} ) b SET a.WEEK_YN ='Y' , a.WEEK_ID = b.week_Id , a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE() , a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE a.COOPERATOR_ID = b.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.WEEK_YN ='N' AND a.USE_AT ='Y'

UPDATE RD_BALANCE a, ( SELECT a.COOPERATOR_ID, d.ESNTL_ID, SUM(day_fee+send_fee+send_price) able_price, SUM(send_fee+send_price) able_price_day FROM RD_WEEK_INFO wi LEFT JOIN RD_WEEK_RIDER_INFO wr ON wi.WEEK_ID = wr.week_id JOIN RD_DAY_PAY a ON wi.COOPERATOR_ID = a.COOPERATOR_ID AND wr.MBER_ID = a.mber_id AND a.use_at = 'Y' AND IO_GUBUN= '2' LEFT JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER d ON wr.mber_id = d.mber_id LEFT JOIN COMTNFILE b ON wi.atch_file_id = b.atch_file_id WHERE 1=1 AND wr.FIX_DAY is NULL AND b.USE_AT ='Y' AND wi.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId}
and a.WEEK_YN ='N' AND a.USE_AT ='Y' AND a.IO_GUBUN = '2' GROUP BY a.COOPERATOR_ID, d.ESNTL_ID )b SET a.BALANCE0 = a.BALANCE0 + b.able_price_day , a.BALANCE1 = a.BALANCE1 - b.able_price , a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE() , a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE a.COOPERATOR_ID = b.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.ESNTL_ID = b.ESNTL_ID
mapper.select: SELECT COOPERATOR_ID, MBER_ID, 'DAY' DW_GUBUN, '2', IO_GUBUN, NVL(DAY_FEE, 0)+NVL(INSURANCE,0)+NVL(SEND_FEE,0) AS FEE , SEND_PRICE, DYP_ID, TRAN_DAY, TELEGRAM_NO,'Y' AS USE_AT, ETC_ID from RD_DAY_PAY WHERE WEEK_YN = 'N' AND USE_AT = 'Y' AND IO_GUBUN = '2' AND COOPERATOR_ID = #{cooperatorId}

SELECT COOPERATOR_ID, MBER_ID, 'DAY' DW_GUBUN, '2', IO_GUBUN, NVL(DAY_FEE, 0)+NVL(INSURANCE,0)+NVL(SEND_FEE,0) AS FEE , SEND_PRICE, DYP_ID, TRAN_DAY, TELEGRAM_NO,'Y' AS USE_AT, ETC_ID from RD_DAY_PAY WHERE WEEK_YN = 'N' AND USE_AT = 'Y' AND IO_GUBUN = '2' AND (COOPERATOR_ID, mber_id) in ( SELECT wi.COOPERATOR_ID, wr.mber_id FROM RD_WEEK_INFO wi LEFT JOIN RD_WEEK_RIDER_INFO wr ON wi.WEEK_ID = wr.week_id LEFT JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER d ON wr.mber_id = d.mber_id JOIN COMTNFILE e ON wi.atch_file_id = e.atch_file_id WHERE 1=1 AND e.USE_AT ='Y' AND wr.FIX_DAY is NULL and wi.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId}
)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RD_TRANSFER (TRAN_DAY, TELEGRAM_NO, DRW_ACCOUNT_CNTN, RV_BANK_CODE, RV_ACCOUNT, RV_ACCOUNT_CNTN, AMOUNT, RES_ALL_YN, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID) VALUES(#{tranDay}, #{telegram_no}, #{drw_account_cntn}, #{rv_bank_code}, #{rv_account}, #{rv_account_cntn}, #{amount}, #{res_all_yn}, SYSDATE(), #{creatId})
mapper.select: SELECT LPAD(NEXTVAL(SQ_TRANSFER), '6', '0')

SELECT * FROM RD_BALANCE WHERE (COOPERATOR_ID, ESNTL_ID) IN ( SELECT COOPERATOR_ID, #{cooperatorMberId} FROM RD_DAY_PAY WHERE (TRAN_DAY, TELEGRAM_NO) IN ( SELECT TRAN_DAY, TELEGRAM_NO FROM RD_TRANSFER WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} ) AND use_At ='Y'
UNION
SELECT #{cooperatorMberId} AS COOPERATOR_ID, c.ESNTL_ID FROM RD_DAY_PAY a, RD_SALES_PROFIT b, COMTNEMPLYRINFO c WHERE a.DYP_ID = b.DYP_ID AND b.EMPLYR_ID = c.EMPLYR_ID AND (a.TRAN_DAY, a.TELEGRAM_NO) IN ( SELECT TRAN_DAY, TELEGRAM_NO FROM RD_TRANSFER WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} ) AND a.USE_AT ='Y' AND b.USE_AT ='Y'
UNION
SELECT #{cooperatorMberId} AS COOPERATOR_ID, c.ESNTL_ID FROM RD_COOPERATOR_PAY a, RD_SALES_PROFIT b, COMTNEMPLYRINFO c WHERE a.COP_ID = b.COP_ID AND b.EMPLYR_ID = c.EMPLYR_ID AND (a.TRAN_DAY, a.TELEGRAM_NO) IN ( SELECT TRAN_DAY, TELEGRAM_NO FROM RD_TRANSFER WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} ) AND a.USE_AT ='Y' AND b.USE_AT ='Y' ) FOR UPDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE RD_BALANCE a, ( SELECT a.cooperator_id, #{cooperatorMberId} AS ESNTL_ID, b.cost FROM RD_DAY_PAY a JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_PROFIT b ON a.DYP_ID = b.DYP_ID WHERE (tran_day, telegram_no) IN ( SELECT tran_day, telegram_no FROM RD_TRANSFER WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} ) AND a.USE_AT ='Y' )b set a.BALANCE0 = a.BALANCE0 + b.cost , a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE() , a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE a.COOPERATOR_ID = b.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.ESNTL_ID = b.ESNTL_ID

UPDATE RD_BALANCE a, ( SELECT #{cooperatorMberId} AS COOPERATOR_ID, c.ESNTL_ID, b.cost FROM RD_DAY_PAY a JOIN RD_SALES_PROFIT b ON a.DYP_ID = b.DYP_ID JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO c ON b.EMPLYR_ID = c.EMPLYR_ID WHERE (TRAN_DAY, TELEGRAM_NO) IN ( SELECT tran_day, telegram_no FROM RD_TRANSFER WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} ) AND a.USE_AT ='Y' )b set a.BALANCE1 = a.BALANCE1 + b.cost , a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE() , a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE a.COOPERATOR_ID = b.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.ESNTL_ID = b.ESNTL_ID
mapper.select: SELECT a.cooperator_id, #{cooperatorMberId} AS MBER_ID, b.cost, tran_day, telegram_no FROM RD_DAY_PAY a LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_PROFIT b ON a.DYP_ID = b.DYP_ID WHERE (tran_day, telegram_no) IN ( SELECT tran_day, telegram_no FROM RD_TRANSFER WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} ) AND a.use_At ='Y'

SELECT #{cooperatorMberId} AS COOPERATOR_ID, c.ESNTL_ID, b.COST, TRAN_DAY, TELEGRAM_NO, b.EMPLYR_ID FROM RD_DAY_PAY a, RD_SALES_PROFIT b , COMTNEMPLYRINFO c WHERE a.DYP_ID = b.DYP_ID AND b.EMPLYR_ID = c.EMPLYR_ID AND (a.TRAN_DAY, a.TELEGRAM_NO) IN ( SELECT TRAN_DAY, TELEGRAM_NO FROM RD_TRANSFER WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} ) AND a.USE_AT ='Y' AND b.USE_AT ='Y'
UNION
SELECT #{cooperatorMberId} AS COOPERATOR_ID, c.ESNTL_ID, b.COST, TRAN_DAY, TELEGRAM_NO, b.EMPLYR_ID FROM RD_COOPERATOR_PAY a, RD_SALES_PROFIT b , COMTNEMPLYRINFO c WHERE a.COP_ID = b.COP_ID AND b.EMPLYR_ID = c.EMPLYR_ID AND (a.TRAN_DAY, a.TELEGRAM_NO) IN ( SELECT TRAN_DAY, TELEGRAM_NO FROM RD_TRANSFER WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} ) AND a.USE_AT ='Y' AND b.USE_AT ='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RD_SCH_ACCOUNT (TRAN_DAY, TELEGRAM_NO, BANK_CODE, ACCOUNT, AMOUNT, RES_ALL_YN, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID) VALUES(#{tranDay}, #{telegram_no}, #{bank_code}, #{account}, #{amount}, #{res_all_yn}, SYSDATE(), #{creatId})
mapper.select:
SELECT
SUM(DELIVERY_PRICE) DELIVERY_PRICE
COOPERATOR_ID, COOPERATOR_NM,REGISTRATION_SN,REGISTRATION_NM,RUN_DE,DELIVERY_SN,DELIVERY_STATE, SERVICE_TYPE,DELIVERY_TYPE,RIDER_ID,MBER_ID,RIDER_NM,DELIVERY_METHOD,SHOP_SN,SHOP_NM,GOODS_PRICE, PICKUP_ADDR,DESTINATION_ADDR,ORDER_DT,OPERATE_RIDER_DT,SHOP_COMEIN_DT,PICKUP_FINIST_DT,DELIVERY_FINIST_DT, DISTANCE,ADD_DELIVERY_REASON,ADD_DELIVERY_DESC,PICKUP_LAW_DONG,BASIC_PRICE,WEATHER_PRIMAGE,ADD_PRIMAGE, PEAK_PRIMAGE_ETC,AREA_PRIMAGE,AMOUNT_PRIMAGE,DELIVERY_PRICE,RIDER_CAUSE_YN,ADD_PRIMAGE_DESC,NOTE,ATCH_FILE_ID,CREAT_DT,CREAT_ID
FROM RD_DELIVERY_INFO WHERE MBER_ID = #{searchId} AND RUN_DE>= #{searchFromDate}AND RUN_DE <= #{searchToDate} ORDER BY run_de DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE RD_DAY_PAY set USE_AT = 'N' WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} AND USE_AT ='Y'
UPDATE RD_WEEK_PAY set USE_AT = 'N' WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} AND USE_AT ='Y'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RD_BALANCE WHERE (COOPERATOR_ID, ESNTL_ID) IN ( SELECT COOPERATOR_ID, b.ESNTL_ID FROM RD_WEEK_PAY a, COMTNGNRLMBER b WHERE a.MBER_ID = b.MBER_ID AND TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} AND USE_AT ='Y' ) FOR UPDATE

SELECT * FROM RD_BALANCE WHERE (COOPERATOR_ID, ESNTL_ID) IN ( SELECT a.COOPERATOR_ID, b.ESNTL_ID FROM RD_DAY_PAY a, COMTNGNRLMBER b WHERE a.MBER_ID = b.MBER_ID AND TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} AND USE_AT ='Y' ) FOR UPDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE RD_BALANCE a, ( SELECT wp.FEE, wp.SEND_PRICE, wp.COOPERATOR_ID, gnr.ESNTL_ID FROM RD_WEEK_PAY wp JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER gnr ON wp.MBER_ID = gnr.MBER_ID WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} AND wp.USE_AT ='Y' ) b SET a.BALANCE1 = a.BALANCE1 + b.FEE + b.SEND_PRICE , a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE() , a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE a.COOPERATOR_ID = b.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.ESNTL_ID = b.ESNTL_ID

UPDATE RD_BALANCE a, ( SELECT dp.SEND_FEE, dp.SEND_PRICE , dp.COOPERATOR_ID, gnr.ESNTL_ID FROM RD_DAY_PAY dp JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER gnr ON dp.MBER_ID = gnr.MBER_ID WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} AND USE_AT ='Y' ) b SET a.BALANCE0 = a.BALANCE0 + b.SEND_FEE + b.SEND_PRICE , a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE() , a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE a.COOPERATOR_ID = b.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.ESNTL_ID = b.ESNTL_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RD_PROFIT (PROFIT_ID, COOPERATOR_ID, MBER_ID, GUBUN, COST, DELIVERY_COST, DELIVERY_CNT, DELIVERY_DAY, DYP_ID, FEE_ID, RIDER_FEE_ID, COP_ID, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID) VALUES(#{profitId}, #{cooperatorId}, #{mberId}, #{gubun}, #{cost}, #{deliveryCost}, #{deliveryCnt}, #{deliveryDay}, #{dypId}, #{feeId}, #{riderFeeId}, #{copId}, SYSDATE(), #{creatId})

INSERT INTO RD_COOPERATOR_PROFIT (COOFIT_ID, PROFIT_ID, COOPERATOR_ID, MBER_ID, GUBUN, COST, DELIVERY_COST, DELIVERY_CNT, DELIVERY_DAY, DYP_ID, FEE_ID, RIDER_FEE_ID, WEEK_YN, WEEK_ID, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID) VALUES(#{coofitId}, #{profitId}, #{cooperatorId}, #{mberId}, #{gubun}, #{cost}, #{deliveryCost}, #{deliveryCnt}, #{deliveryDay}, #{dypId}, #{feeId}, #{riderFeeId}, #{weekYn}, #{weekId},SYSDATE(), #{creatId})

INSERT INTO RD_SALES_PROFIT (SALFIT_ID, PROFIT_ID, EMPLYR_ID, COOPERATOR_ID, MBER_ID, GUBUN, COST, DELIVERY_CNT, DELIVERY_DAY, DYP_ID, FEE_ID, RIDER_FEE_ID, COP_ID, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID) VALUES(#{salfitId}, #{profitId}, #{emplyrId}, #{cooperatorId}, #{mberId}, #{gubun}, #{cost}, #{deliveryCnt}, #{deliveryDay}, #{dypId}, #{feeId}, #{riderFeeId}, #{copId}, SYSDATE(), #{creatId})
mapper.update: UPDATE RD_PROFIT SET USE_AT ='N' WHERE PROFIT_ID IN ( SELECT b.PROFIT_ID FROM RD_DAY_PAY a LEFT JOIN RD_PROFIT b ON a.DYP_ID = b.DYP_ID AND b.GUBUN = 'D' AND b.USE_AT ='Y' WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} )

UPDATE RD_PROFIT SET USE_AT ='N' WHERE PROFIT_ID IN ( SELECT b.PROFIT_ID FROM RD_COOPERATOR_PAY a LEFT JOIN RD_PROFIT b ON a.cop_id = b.cop_id AND b.GUBUN = 'D' AND b.USE_AT ='Y' WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} )

UPDATE RD_SALES_PROFIT SET USE_AT ='N' WHERE SALFIT_ID IN ( SELECT b.SALFIT_ID FROM RD_COOPERATOR_PAY a LEFT JOIN RD_SALES_PROFIT b ON a.cop_id = b.cop_id AND b.GUBUN = 'D' AND b.USE_AT ='Y' WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} )

UPDATE RD_COOPERATOR_PROFIT SET USE_AT ='N' WHERE COOFIT_ID IN ( SELECT b.COOFIT_ID FROM RD_DAY_PAY a LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_PROFIT b ON a.DYP_ID = b.DYP_ID AND b.GUBUN = 'D' AND b.use_at ='Y' WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} )

UPDATE RD_SALES_PROFIT SET USE_AT ='N' WHERE SALFIT_ID IN ( SELECT b.SALFIT_ID FROM RD_DAY_PAY a LEFT JOIN RD_SALES_PROFIT b ON a.DYP_ID = b.DYP_ID AND b.GUBUN = 'D' AND b.use_at ='Y' WHERE TRAN_DAY = #{tranDay} AND TELEGRAM_NO = #{telegram_no} )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM RD_BALANCE WHERE (COOPERATOR_ID, ESNTL_ID) IN ( SELECT a.COOPERATOR_ID, d.ESNTL_ID FROM RD_DELIVERY_INFO a LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_FEE b ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = b.COOPERATOR_ID AND b.use_at ='Y' LEFT JOIN RD_RIDER_FEE c ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = c.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.MBER_ID = c.MBER_ID AND c.use_at ='Y' LEFT JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER d ON a.mber_id = d.mber_id JOIN COMTNFILE e ON a.ATCH_FILE_ID = e.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND e.USE_AT ='Y' AND a.RUN_DE BETWEEN #{searchFromDate} AND #{searchToDate}
AND d.MBER_NM like '%' #{searchNm} '%'
AND a.FIX_DAY is null /* 확정은 미확정 데이터를 대상으로만 한다 */ GROUP BY a.COOPERATOR_ID, d.ESNTL_ID
UNION
SELECT a.COOPERATOR_ID, #{cooperatorMberId} AS ESNTL_ID FROM RD_DELIVERY_INFO a LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR_FEE b ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = b.COOPERATOR_ID AND b.use_at ='Y' LEFT JOIN RD_RIDER_FEE c ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = c.COOPERATOR_ID AND a.MBER_ID = c.MBER_ID AND c.use_at ='Y' LEFT JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER d ON a.mber_id = d.mber_id JOIN COMTNFILE e ON a.ATCH_FILE_ID = e.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND e.USE_AT ='Y' AND a.RUN_DE BETWEEN #{searchFromDate} AND #{searchToDate}
AND d.MBER_NM like '%' #{searchNm} '%'
AND a.FIX_DAY is null /* 확정은 미확정 데이터를 대상으로만 한다 */ GROUP BY a.COOPERATOR_ID ) FOR UPDATE
select * from RD_BALANCE WHERE COOPERATOR_ID = #{cooperatorId} and ESNTL_ID = #{esntlId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RD_BALANCE (COOPERATOR_ID, ESNTL_ID, BALANCE0, BALANCE1) VALUES(#{cooperatorId}, #{esntlId}, #{balance0}, #{balance1})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(b.WEEK_ID) TOTAL_CNT FROM RD_WEEK_INFO a LEFT JOIN RD_WEEK_RIDER_INFO b ON a.WEEK_ID = b.WEEK_ID WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId} AND b.FIX_DAY IS NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(a.COOPERATOR_ID) TOTAL_CNT FROM RD_DELIVERY_INFO a
WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId} AND a.FIX_DAY IS NOT NULL

SELECT * FROM RD_BALANCE WHERE (COOPERATOR_ID, ESNTL_ID) IN ( SELECT COOPERATOR_ID, b.ESNTL_ID FROM RD_DELIVERY_INFO a, COMTNGNRLMBER b WHERE a.MBER_ID = b.MBER_ID AND a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId} ) FOR UPDATE

SELECT * FROM RD_BALANCE WHERE (COOPERATOR_ID, ESNTL_ID) IN ( SELECT a.COOPERATOR_ID, c.ESNTL_ID FROM RD_WEEK_INFO a LEFT JOIN RD_WEEK_RIDER_INFO b on a.WEEK_ID = b.WEEK_ID JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER c ON b.MBER_ID = c.MBER_ID WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId} ) FOR UPDATE
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RD_WEEK_RIDER_INFO WHERE WEEK_ID IN (SELECT WEEK_ID FROM RD_WEEK_INFO WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId})
mapper.select:
SELECT WEEK_ID,a.COOPERATOR_ID,ACCOUNTS_ST_DT,ACCOUNTS_ED_DT ,DELIVERY_COST ,ADD_ACCOUNTS ,OPERATING_COST,MANAGEMENT_COST ,OPERATING_FEE,ETC_COST,TIME_INSURANCE,OWNER_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE,RIDER_EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE,OWNER_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE ,RIDER_INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE,WITHHOLDING_TAX_INSURANCE_SUM,EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE_ACCOUNTS,INDUSTRIAL_INSURANCE_ACCOUNTS ,G,ACCOUNTS_SCHEDULE_COST,TAX_BILL_SUPPLY,TAX_BILL_ADD ,TAX_BILL_SUM ,NOTE,a.ATCH_FILE_ID,a.CREAT_DT,a.CREAT_ID ,OPERATING_COST_ADD, c.COOPERATOR_NM FROM RD_WEEK_INFO_OUT a JOIN COMTNFILE b ON a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID LEFT JOIN RD_COOPERATOR c ON a.COOPERATOR_ID = c.COOPERATOR_ID WHERE 1=1 AND b.USE_AT ='Y' AND a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{searchAtchFileId}
/* 협력사 조건 *//* COOPERATOR_ID로 조건을 만든건 ★정산 파일을 올릴때 권한이 있는 협력사ID 데이터만 올릴수 있음!!★ - 나머지는 오류 처리할꺼임 */ AND a.COOPERATOR_ID IN ( SELECT COOPERATOR_ID FROM RD_COOPERATOR a WHERE a.REGISTRATION_SN = #{schIhidNum} AND use_at ='Y' )
